entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chetwynd
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:52 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -25.4°C

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 22.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind becoming north 20 km/h early this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 38 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 26. POP 30%
